column4: Hey everyone, don't suppose someone could help me solve this tiny issue that I have?.

Having a problem with installing WoW, i've read the forums and such when I click on the Installer.exe it says Access denied also - It won't let me copy and paste the files onto the desktop into a folder. I can solve it by doing it as root but I REALLY don't want too do that
try chaning the folder premissions (right click on the folder and choose properties)
you might want to change it from root mode nautilus tought (gksudo nautilus)
